Deploying a Jekyll site with Kamal
excerpt: Since Kamal 2 can host multiple sites on the same server, I am consolidating my apps into larger hosts so I have less servers to worry about. Most of my apps are Rails apps, but I have a few static jekyll sites like this blog and I decided to look into how could I move this site to a server I host other Rails apps on.

title: 3 Simple steps to setup Jekyll Categories and Tags
excerpt: Why Jekyll Categories or Tags? Imagine you have a blog where you discuss very different things all together. Many bloggers post their personal experiences along with some professional posts. Curating information is very important to make users browse through your website with ease. What if New York Times had no categories like Politics, Business, Tech etc..? How hard would it be to track what happened to last night’s football game? There should be a Sports category to make readers’ life easy.
